trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: Ger en typkonverterare konvertera <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"> </xref> objekt till och från olika representationer.

trans-unit.source: The ListBindingConverter is used to evaluate and convert a property of an object into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: ListBindingConverter används för att utvärdera och konvertera en egenskap för ett objekt i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> is applied to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class with the type of the ListBindingConverter as an argument.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>tillämpas på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>klass med typ av ListBindingConverter som ett argument.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om typen konverterare finns det <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>basklassen och [så här: Implementera en typkonverterare](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of the ListBindingConverter class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Aldrig ska du skapa en instans av klassen ListBindingConverter.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Istället anropa <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>metoden <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i exemplen i <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>grundläggande klass.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBindingConverter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om konverteraren kan konvertera objektet till den angivna typen med den angivna kontexten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som ger en kontext som format.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som motsvarar den typ som du vill konvertera till.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den här konverteraren kan utföra konverteringen; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: Konverterar det angivna värdeobjektet till den angivna typen, med hjälp av angivna kontexten och kultur information.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som ger en kontext som format.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> skickas, aktuellt kulturen antas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>omvandla.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>att konvertera värdeparametern att.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerar det konvertera värdet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the type that this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> is associated with, using the specified context, given a set of property values for the object.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av typen som detta <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> är kopplad till, med det angivna sammanhanget med en uppsättning egenskapsvärden för objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som ger en kontext som format.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of new property values.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>nya egenskapsvärden.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the given <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerar den angivna <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om objektet inte kan skapas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden returnerar alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether changing a value on this object requires a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*> to create a new value, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar om du ändrar ett värde i det här objektet kräver ett anrop till <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>att skapa ett nytt värde med det angivna sammanhanget.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som ger en kontext som format.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if changing a property on this object requires a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*> to create a new value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om du ändrar en egenskap för det här objektet kräver ett anrop till <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>att skapa ett nytt värde; annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.CreateInstance*>
